Articles.Content: yellow circle at the bottom has a faint D on it, definitely duna!
Has Moho been mapsatted? What were the findings if any?

Btw, someone has to go to Ike and search for anomolies there, im sure they'll find something

Checked, no Anomalies.

Edited September 28, 2012 by 0jam3290

Has Moho been mapsatted? What were the findings if any?

I'll double check when I get home, but I don't recall any anomalies found.

I'll double check when I get home, but I don't recall any anomalies found.

I ask as the magic boulder is potentially sitting on the surface of a planet/moon like the Command Pod memorial and I don't recall seeing any Moho mapsat.

Checked, no Anomalies.

It's been stated that there is one on Ike but the MapSat mod won't pick it up. Having said that I'm sending 4 rovers to Ike. My theory is that since Ike is tidally locked with Duna what ever we are after must be on the side facing Duna. I'm going to start looking there.

Its SOI is very small, so good luck.

I don't know for sure if the duna image was the clue, or if I just got lucky. I launched from Duna when the inner 3 planets aligned and saw a little hiccup in the patched conics.

My theory about the duna image was that the three circles on the right represent the inner 3 planets alligning, and the orange one to represent Duna.
